welcome_message_body: Welcome to Giresun, Turkey! Get ready to experience the charm of this beautiful city known for its lush greenery, stunning coastline, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Giresun has to offer.

restaurants.name: Dem Meyhanesi
restaurants.description: Dem Meyhanesi is a meyhane located in Giresun.
restaurants.address: Gazi Cad. Hasan Akbulut Sok. No:1/2, 28100 Giresun

restaurants.name: Fiskos Cafe & Restaurant
restaurants.description: Fiskos Cafe & Restaurant is a café located in Şeyh Keramettin.

restaurants.description: Big Bros is a café located in Merkez.

restaurants.name: Tepebaşı Balıkçılık
restaurants.description: Tepebaşı Balıkçılık is a fish and chips shop located in Merkez.
restaurants.address: Kapu Mahhalesi Doktorbaki Gurkan Sok. Debboy, Giresun

restaurants.name: Serender Restaurant
restaurants.description: Serender Restaurant is a restaurant located in Giresun.
